ingredients.ingredient: 1 (270 g) tub PHILADELPHIA Savory Garlic Cooking Creme Cream Cheese Product
3 pounds baking potatoes, peeled, very thinly sliced
⅔ cup KRAFT 100% Grated Parmesan Cheese

cookingTips: Slice potatoes uniformly thin for even cooking throughout the dish
Layer potatoes evenly to ensure the cream sauce coats all layers
enrichment.coachingPrompt: What's the best way to slice potatoes uniformly for even cooking in a scalloped potato dish?
